locality: Alter-do-chão, topo do morro da Piraóca.

locality: Morro dos Seis Lagos (Hill of the Six Lakes). Iron canga substrate enriched in niobium and radioactive. No mineral soil; very well drained. Low forest with thin stems resembles caatinga or bana, has strong spring root mat over loose boulders, with thin litter accumulation. Vouchers from forest inventory (1/10 ha 500 m X 2 m min DBH=2 cm).
